entries.title: Can Lenovo's Yoga Book 9i finally make dual-screen laptops a thing?
entries.description: Lenovo takes another crack at making a dual-screen laptop that's less conceptual futurism and more practical portable workstation -- and this one might hit.

entries.title: The Philips Fidelio FB1 soundbar is built to impress audiophiles, and it's now on sale
entries.description: If you're into customizing sound and fine-tuning your home audio experience, you can get this impressive Philips soundbar for $100 off.

entries.title: L'Oréal wins two awards for inclusive beauty tech at CES 2023
entries.description: At CES, L'Oreal unveils two prototypes that place accessibility at the forefront of beauty technology.

entries.title: John Deere rolls out new battery-powered farming and construction equipment
entries.description: John Deere, an innovator in automation, sustainability, and robotics in the farming and construction industries, unveiled two new technologies to kick off CES 2023.

entries.title: Vanilla OS offers a new take on security for the Linux desktop
entries.description: If you're looking for a new operating system that takes security seriously, but doesn't cause major user headaches, Vanilla OS might be just the ticket.

entries.title: Delta to extend free Wi-Fi across all flights
entries.description: Starting February 1, Wi-Fi will be free on all Delta planes that are capable, comprising about 80% of its fleet, Delta CEO Ed Bastian announced Thursday at CES.

entries.title: Soon you'll be able to make WhatsApp calls with Android Auto
entries.description: At CES, Google rolled out several new features and design upgrades to Android Auto, the platform that connects your phone to your car display

entries.title: Razer digs into VR, shows flurry of Blades, Edges, Leviathans, and... Carol?
entries.description: The gaming peripheral company arrived at CES 2023 with a slate of new laptops, audio/video equipment, its new Edge handheld, and a surprise or two.

entries.title: My favorite MSI gaming laptop just dropped by $550
entries.description: This laptop is currently over $500 off, offering some great savings if you're always on the go.

entries.title: My favorite MSI gaming laptop just dropped by $550
entries.description: This laptop is currently over $500 off, offering some great savings if you're always on the go.

entries.title: Amazon's new Fire TV is now 31% off
entries.description: The holidays may have come and gone, but for those in the market for a TV, the new Amazon QLED model can be yours for $150 off.

entries.title: Amazon's new Fire TV is now 31% off
entries.description: The holidays may have come and gone, but for those in the market for a TV, the new Amazon QLED model can be yours for $150 off.

entries.title: HTC's VIVE XR Elite aims to be the new all-in-one, premium headset for everyone
entries.description: HTC is finally ready to take its shot at recapturing leadership of the VR/AR space with a new headset designed to handle any AR,VR,MR, or XR task you throw at it. And, it's priced significantly lower than the the Meta Quest Pro.

entries.title: Android's new Spotify and YouTube notification system sounds like a music streaming dream
entries.description: Android is working with Spotify and YouTube music for an easy way to switch music playback across multiple devices.

entries.title: What is a MacOS Smart Folder and how do you create one?
entries.description: Smart Folders allow you to specify a set of criteria for items to be contained in the folder, to make keeping track of files even easier on a Mac or MacBook.

entries.title: What are Firefox Container Tabs and how do you use them?
entries.description: If you're looking to add even more security to the Firefox browser, you might consider using the Containers feature, with its Container Tabs. Find out what these do and how to use them.

entries.title: How to screen record in Windows 10 or Windows 11
entries.description: Windows 10 and 11 both offer a screen recording tool that's geared for gameplay but can record just about any type of screen activity.

entries.title: This new optical tech could make AR glasses look much cooler
entries.description: Natural-looking glasses combining augmented reality functionality and prescription lenses could be on the way.

entries.title: How to make creating new documents in Linux easier with templates
entries.description: The Linux desktop has a lot of tricks up its sleeve to help make your experience more efficient. One such trick lies in the Templates folder. Find out what this is for and how it's used.

entries.title: I went hands-on with Motorola's ThinkPhone and it's surprisingly good
entries.description: The Lenovo-Motorola collab at CES 2023 is geared towards business professionals and enterprises with all the security features you'd want -- and more.

entries.title: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic is $151 off
entries.description: We all love saving money and looking good. Fortunately enough, this Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic allows you to do both of those at nearly 45% off.

entries.title: Lenovo's new ThinkBooks offer some unexpected twists on laptop design
entries.description: The SMB-focused ThinkBook range gets a dual-screen convertible with 13.3-inch OLED and 12-inch E Ink screens, and a 16-inch laptop with a modular Magic Bay.

entries.title: Lenovo enters the E Ink battle with Lenovo Smart Paper
entries.description: E Ink e-book readers and note-takers are gaining momentum again.

entries.title: Lenovo's eye-catching Yoga Book 9i is the world's first dual-OLED screen laptop
entries.description: At CES, Lenovo introduces an innovative laptop design with dual-screen portrait and landscape modes.

entries.title: TCL makes a surprising full-court press into the AR/VR space at CES 2023
entries.description: While everyone's watching Meta, HTC, Lenovo, and even Apple, a company better known for cheap TVs and smartphones quietly unveiled an intriguing slate of AR and VR plans at this year's show.

entries.title: Why is Apple Sidecar still missing these two critical features?
entries.description: I hooked up my iPad using Sidecar and was baffled to find out that these two simple but important features are still missing four years after release.

entries.title: New York City Schools has blocked access to ChatGPT: Here's why
entries.description: New York City Department of Education restricts access to the ChatGPT chatbot for both staff and students.

entries.title: ChatGPT was just blocked by the biggest US school district. Here's why
entries.description: New York City Department of Education restricts access to the ChatGPT chatbot for both staff and students.

entries.title: New York City Schools blocked access to ChatGPT: Here's why
entries.description: New York City Department of Education restricts access to the ChatGPT chatbot for both staff and students.

entries.title: Now this password-stealing Android malware wants to grab your bank details too
entries.description: And that's not everything that this nasty malware can do.

entries.title: Ring unveils new car dashboard camera at CES 2023
entries.description: The Amazon-owned security company also brought back the Ring Peephole Cam for users that can't add a video doorbell to their front doors.

entries.title: How to password-protect a document with LibreOffice
entries.description: If LibreOffice is your office suite of choice, and you need to protect a document with a password, you're in luck, as the feature is built in and simple to use.

entries.title: Sony and Honda just showed off this sleek EV prototype
entries.description: First shipments of these new Afeela EVs are expected by 2026.

entries.title: Microsoft Teams: Here's what's new, from emojis to chat upgrades
entries.description: Microsoft in December rolled out new whiteboard capabilities in Teams that should make it faster to collaborate on a shared canvas.

entries.title: Amazon is cutting a massive 18,000 jobs in 'uncertain' economy
entries.description: Amazon chief Andy Jassy says he disclosed the layoffs earlier than he intended because an employee leaked the plans to media.

entries.title: Save $1000 on this premium 75-inch LG TV at Best Buy
entries.description: If you're willing to invest in a significant upgrade to your home entertainment setup, this deal is for you.

entries.title: Save $1000 on this premium 75-inch LG TV at Best Buy
entries.description: If you're willing to invest in a significant upgrade to your home entertainment setup, this deal is for you.

entries.title: Singapore tech pioneer behind Sound Blaster dies, marking end of illustrious era
entries.description: Creative Technology's founder and CEO Sim Wong Hoo not only helped put Singapore on the global technology map with its Sound Blaster audio cards, he also carved an era that encapsulated never-say-die entrepreneurship.

entries.title: CES 2023: LG Display launches new OLED panels with top brightness of 2,100 nits
entries.description: The Korean display panel maker used micro lens technology to increase the luminance and viewing angle of its latest TV panels.

entries.title: AMD debuts the Ryzen 7040 series, with dedicated on-chip AI engine
entries.description: During her CES 2023 keynote, AMD CEO Lisa Su showcases the industry's first mobile x86 processor to feature a dedicated on-chip AI engine

entries.title: CES 2023 on Thursday: How to watch the debut of the electric Ram truck
entries.description: On the first official day of the world's largest tech conference, expect to see electrifying news from carmaker Stellantis, John Deere and others; plus, watch for news from influencers like chef Jose Andres and CISA Director Jen Easterly

entries.title: Govee presents its first Matter-enabled smart lights at CES 2023
entries.description: The smart lighting manufacturer is teaming up with Google to showcase the new Matter-certified light strip at CES 2023.

entries.title: Samsung's Ready Care smart-car system is straight from a Sci-Fi movie
entries.description: Samsung's subsidiary, Harman, aims to raise the bar on driver safety with Ready Care safety features, including a machine learning algorithm to measure driver drowsiness.

entries.title: CES 2023 Day 2: The biggest reveals
entries.description: Day 2 of CES saw some major announcements from major companies like Asus and AMD. Catch the TL;DR below.

entries.title: A health tracker for any watch: Baracoda's BHeart brings sustainability to the wearables industry
entries.description: Baracoda's BHeart health tracker, unveiled at CES, can operate in most standard watches, eliminating the need to choose between your smartwatch and a formal timepiece.
